name: PitchPro Freelancer
description: An AI‑powered agent that automatically reads freelance job postings, evaluates a freelancer's portfolio and market rates, then drafts a personalized proposal email with a competitive price quote. It streamlines the bidding process for freelancers on platforms like Upwork, Fiverr, and LinkedIn Jobs.

tools.name: fetch_job_posting
tools.description: Retrieves the raw HTML content of a freelance job posting given its public URL.

url.description: The full URL of the job posting page.

tools.name: parse_job_posting
tools.description: Extracts structured information (title, description, budget, required skills, deadline) from raw job posting HTML.

html_content.description: The raw HTML string returned by fetch_job_posting.

tools.name: fetch_portfolio
tools.description: Pulls a freelancer's portfolio data (skills, past projects, ratings, hourly rate) from a public profile URL or internal ID.

profile_url.description: URL of the freelancer's public portfolio page.

tools.name: analyze_market_rate
tools.description: Computes the average market hourly rate for a given set of skills and optional location, based on recent freelance marketplace data.

skills.description: List of technical or professional skills required for the job.

location.description: Optional geographic region (e.g., "US", "Europe") to narrow market data.

tools.name: generate_proposal
tools.description: Creates a custom proposal text and a price quote (hourly or fixed) based on job details, freelancer profile, and market rate analysis.

market_rate.description: Average market hourly rate (USD) from analyze_market_rate.

pricing_strategy.description: How aggressive the price quote should be relative to market_rate.

tools.name: format_email
tools.description: Wraps the proposal text into a professional email body, adds subject line and greeting.

proposal_text.description: The full proposal generated by generate_proposal.

client_name.description: Name of the client or hiring manager extracted from the job posting (if available).

subject.description: Desired subject line for the email.

tools.name: send_email
tools.description: Sends the formatted email to the client via SMTP or a third‑party email service.

examples.description: User requests a pitch for a specific Upwork job posting; the agent fetches, parses, analyses market rates, and returns a ready‑to‑send email.
